sentence.Network_en: When the chairman of Campbell's retired, McGovern was named as his successor.
sentence.Network_cn: 坎贝尔公司的总裁退休后，麦戈文被选定为继任者。

sentence.Network_en: He was generous enough to congratulate his successor on his decision.
sentence.Network_cn: 他十分大度地祝贺他的继任者做出了决定。

sentence.Network_en: He had bowed out gracefully when his successor had been appointed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在继任者被任命后体面地引退了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一段情两颗❤ 三个字 。 ... 342. assumption n. 假定 343. successor n. 继任者 344. bond n. 联系.
会计&财务术语的中英对照_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... substitute 取代 successors 继承人 suits 讼案.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... successive a. 逐次的，相继的 successor 后续 such a. 这样的，如此.
后字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 后人〖 latergenerations〗 后任〖 successor〗 后日〖 henceforth;fromnowon〗.

list.abs: Character  - Chinese Character Dictionary... ... 蒙子[ cover] 苗子[ young successor] 抹子[ trowel].
可行后继(Feasible Successor)：一个邻居路由器，它满足FC，具有到目的地第二低度量值的路由器。当主路由S不可用时，FS被用来 …
direct product 直积direct successor 紧接后元direct sum 直和
lawful succession 合法继承lawful successor 合法继承人Layman’s Guide to Slope Maintenance 《斜坡维修简易指南》.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French successour, from Latin successor, from the verb succedere (see succeed)

entry.def: Someone's successor is the person who takes their job after they have left.

example.ex: He set out several principles that he hopes will guide his successors...
example.tran: 他制订了几条原则，希望可以引导继任者。

example.ex: ...several critics hailed him then as the greatest living Scottish poet, the natural successor to his old friend Hugh MacDiarmid.
example.tran: 紧接着，一些评论家称赞他为当今苏格兰最伟大的诗人，是他的老朋友休·麦克迪尔米德理所当然的接班人。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who follows next in order;
2. a thing or person that immediately replaces something or someone
3. a person who inherits some title or office

auth_sentence.content: We're leaving my successor with an excellent squad.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're leaving my successor with an excellent squad.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're leaving my successor with an excellent squad.

auth_sentence.content: No successor was named by the bank's board.
auth_sentence.res_content: No successor was named by the bank's board.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No successor was named by the bank's board.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, Berkshire has not alerted the likely successor.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, Berkshire has not alerted the likely successor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, Berkshire has not alerted the likely successor.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

Sentence.sentence: The technologically compromised space shuttle program has just come to an end, with no successor.

means.word_mean: 接替的人或事物, 继任者, 继承人

sentences.en: When will they name a successor?
sentences.cn: 他们什么时候会任命继承人?

jushi.english: When will they name a successor?
jushi.chinese: 他们什么时候会任命继承人？
